definition: to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: Door-to-door service is the consistent style of our shop.
sentences.chinese: 这部小说秉承了他一贯的沉抑风格。

sentences.english: Innovation is a recognized part of Motorola's 75-year heritage.
sentences.chinese: 年来，摩托罗拉一直秉承着创新的传统。

sentences.english: YanChong adhering to the idea love is omnipotent, then use their cell phones the braille.
sentences.chinese: 言重秉承爱是无所不能的想法，便用手机拍下点字。

sentences.english: This may seem at odds with the value we place on relevant text-based ads.
sentences.chinese: 这似乎和我们秉承的文本关联广告模式有些冲突。

sentences.english: Shanghang talent network adhering to the "people-centered innovation."
sentences.chinese: 上杭人才网秉承“以人为中心，开拓创新。”

sentences.english: Huang Weimin's calligraphy bases on the tradition, to seek the aroma and be full of classic.
sentences.chinese: 黄卫民的书法，秉承传统，追求古韵，蕴藉经典。

sentences.english: The principle of the Olympics must be upheld, that is, the Olympic Games should not be politicized.
sentences.chinese: 我们要秉承奥运会的宗旨，就是不能把奥运会政治化。

sentences.english: LSBF enjoys a stated mission to develop students to become global leaders.
sentences.chinese: LSBF秉承以培养全球领袖为目标的办学理念。

sentences.english: She works in theatre, following in her father's footsteps.
sentences.chinese: 她秉承父业，也从事戏剧工作。

sentences.english: In imperial times, the critical tradition was carried forward by such scholars as Huang Zongxi.
sentences.chinese: 在帝王时代，黄宗羲等学者秉承批评传统。

sentences.english: Like most of her recordings, both are issued by Sony Masterworks.
sentences.chinese: 秉承一贯传统，由索尼古典音乐录制及发行。

sentences.english: My hotel, too, had absorbed some of this ancient inertia.
sentences.chinese: 我住的旅馆也秉承了某些古老的惰性。

sentences.english: The company always adheres to the quality policy of "superior quality".
sentences.chinese: 公司秉承“万力优质”的质量方针。

sentences.english: He hoped that the Diet's Japan-China Friendship League could carry forward the friendly tradition and continue to play active role in this field.
sentences.chinese: 希望日中议联秉承友好传统，继续发挥积极作用。

sentences.english: We work with integrity and put our best effort into every job.
sentences.chinese: 我们秉承诚信原则，对每一件事的倾注全力。

sentences.english: Fuyuan Chemical adheres to quality policy of"quality first, customer first".
sentences.chinese: 富苑化工秉承“质量为本，用户至上”的经营理念。

definition: based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to develop/to make full use of
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
